intro: Elatostema taoyuanense, commonly known as the Taoyuan Elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is a small herbaceous plant characterized by its delicate, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of tiny greenish-white flowers. Native to China, it thrives in moist, shaded environments such as mountain forests. The plant has a short flowering period, typically in spring, and is known for its rapid growth and ability to colonize disturbed soils. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
